Antï¿½nio Mota wrote:
> Putting it in other words that seems to imply that a GET after a 
> DELETE should always return 404, not a 200 (providing the DELETE was 
> successful).
>

It definitely doesn't say that in the spec!

Besides, how could that client be aware of whether a given removed URI 
was not reinstated immediately by another agent somewhere?
